feedback:
Limited DRIVER framework demonstration. Focus on these missing stages: V, E, R2, D.


AREAS FOR IMPROVEMENT:
- Financial APP: The submission contains no discussion, examples, features, calculations, or demonstrations showing the tool performs financial tasks, so it does not meet the Financial APP criterion. The DRIVER stages lack substantive content to support a passing evaluation.
- Integrate AI: The submission contains no mention or description of AI features, functionality, or how AI adds value—only a note about reusing a previous project. Under the moderate standard, conceptual discussion would suffice, but no such discussion exists in the DISCOVER or IMPLEMENT evidence, so the criterion is not demonstrated.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "I will be utilizing my second project drop on this project."
"I will be utilizing my second project drop on this project." (IMPLEMENT stage)
"I will be utilizing my second project drop on this project." (DISCOVER stage)
criteria.driver_alignment: Both the DISCOVER and IMPLEMENT stages are present but contain only the repeated statement about reusing a prior project; neither stage provides any description or evidence of financial functionality, tasks, or outputs.
criteria.reasoning: The submission contains no discussion, examples, features, calculations, or demonstrations showing the tool performs financial tasks, so it does not meet the Financial APP criterion. The DRIVER stages lack substantive content to support a passing evaluation.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "I will be utilizing my second project drop on this project."
"I will be utilizing my second project drop on this project."
"I will be utilizing my second project drop on this project."
criteria.driver_alignment: The DISCOVER and IMPLEMENT stages both contain only the statement above, indicating the student reused a prior project but provided no discussion or evidence of integrating AI capabilities.
criteria.reasoning: The submission contains no mention or description of AI features, functionality, or how AI adds value—only a note about reusing a previous project. Under the moderate standard, conceptual discussion would suffice, but no such discussion exists in the DISCOVER or IMPLEMENT evidence, so the criterion is not demonstrated.
